description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Some Sciener-based locks support plaintext message processing over Bluetooth Low Energy, allowing unencrypted malicious commands to be passed to the lock. These malicious commands, less then 16 bytes in length, will be processed by the lock as if they were encrypted communications. This can be further exploited by an attacker to compromise the lock's integrity.

Algunas cerraduras basadas en Sciener admiten el procesamiento de mensajes de texto plano a través de Bluetooth Low Energy, lo que permite pasar comandos maliciosos sin cifrar a la cerradura. Estos comandos maliciosos, de menos de 16 bytes de longitud, serán procesados por la cerradura como si fueran comunicaciones cifradas. Un atacante puede aprovechar aún más esto para comprometer la integridad del bloqueo.
